text: Riad Yassin Abdallah (, a.k.a. Riyadh Yassin Abdullah; born June 20, 1955 in Aden) was the Foreign Minister of Yemen between March and December 2015.Yemen FM urges swift end to air strikes on Houthis, BBC, 27 March 2015 Abdulmalik Al-Mekhlafi succeeds him. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1955 births Category:Yemeni politicians Category:Alumni of Kingston University Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Yemeni Sunni Muslims Category:Yemeni Muslims
title: Riad Yassin
